website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality professional basketball rack from a known name in sports equipment.
pros: Can hold up to 12 regulation basketballs
Steel frame is durable and won't rust
Can be used on indoor or outdoor courts
Tough wheel design won't leave marks on gym floor and can handle outdoor court terrain
cons: Some customers report that the wheels need to be tightened from time to time to keep them from wobbling

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product - worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product was simple to put together (I'm a female 60+ and had no issues). It appears to be of good quality and is sturdy, not wobbly at all as other reviews on other similar products had stated. So glad that I paid a little extra and got a rack that looks like it will last. The powder coating is really nice. Also want to mention that the wheels are substantial, not junk!! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Good rack for the price
customer_reviews.text: We use this at church and it does the job. It's not the strongest rack available (obviously) but for light usage it is great. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Buerhaus

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal if you are looking for a nice ball rack that will last. It is solid and well made.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom

customer_reviews.title: Good for women’s balls not men’s
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold 4 men’s balls on top level for rack. As you can see in pic, ball on top left is squeezed in to fit, which causes lopsided balls. So we will only have 3 balls on top level of rack. Lower two levels don’t have a bar in the way that allows for more space. However the rack is sturdy and was relatively easy to build. And I do imagine women’s balls would fit on top level.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mezistrano

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for the hubby for his new indoor court. Excellent addition!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shanaya Solano

customer_reviews.title: Every shooter NEEDS!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to put this together but it was SUPER easy! My son loves this rack for shooting & easily storing his basketballs!
customer_reviews.author: ALMS

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp Looking!
customer_reviews.text: This rack was on the more difficult level of putting together but if you stick with it and follow the instructions with some common sense you will have this put together in about 20-30 minutes. This looks very nice in our league office and since we only use Baden Balls it makes since. Very sturdy and stylish. Excellent value with the free shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Mccluskey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd day of practice and the wheel breaks off. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bailey

customer_reviews.title: It is really nice and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.text: The basketball rack is a very simple way to keep all basketballs in place ands organized. Its sturdy, yet light weight and easy to maneuver. I wish it was little bigger, but otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd rack that I have purchased. These are solid, can take a beating, and look sleek.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great rack for all our balls! Holds 12 balls perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Gary P Affolter II

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Built this and had it working within 20 minutes. Good size and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build, sturdy, all around cool looking. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Noah O’Connor

customer_reviews.title: Ball Holder
customer_reviews.text: I just love this ball rack. I could do without the signs on the side. I just needed a rack. It makes everything more compact of where balls are in my garage and me not always running them over. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Watz

customer_reviews.title: Rack 'em
customer_reviews.text: These racks are easy to put together and look nice. They are light duty, so be gentle putting them together; you could easily bend a piece or strip a screw hole using a power driver, etc. Shipping was great, shopping no hassle, and the product is exactly as advertised! Amazon is fantastic to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: gymrat321

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are wobbly. I'm sure my grandson is really pleased with it. It holds all of his and his brother's basketballs.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lee Walters

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and very sturdy. Price is great too! We use it for our middle school boys basketball team. Item is just as it was described.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Baden Steel Basketball Rack (12 balls)
customer_reviews.text: Design is really a good looking rack, and construction is easy. Be careful however that no one leans heavily or sits on it as the wheel base will buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Connor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack
customer_reviews.text: Like the Baden sign so it can be distinguished from others in the store room. Best rolling rack of the four we own.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Baden Steel Basketball Rack
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Easy to assemble,compact and really a good looking rack to hold our basket balls.
customer_reviews.author: hunter

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The threads are pretty impossible to get the screws into. I'm an hour in and this is what I have. There is powdercoating that has dripped into all of the holes. The wheels won't go in either all the way. So its completely trash. $85 for this? Haha
customer_reviews.author: ben campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: We are a basketball family and love this storage rolling rack. It holds 12 balls and the wheels are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powdercoated threads makes purchaser angry
customer_reviews.text: The product looked nice in the photos and looked nice as it sat in the box. The powdercoating is all through the threads and makes the bolts nearly impossible to tighten. Currently, I have three wheels on and am debating whether it is easier to to take apart and send back or to find the nearest bonfire and make a contribution.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nowling

product_meta.title: Baden Steel Basketball Rack (12-Balls)
product_meta.description: The Baden Steel Basketball Rack is an industry best and was designed to last. This carts steel frame construction holds 12 official size basketballs and a number of other inflatables. The rack comes with enhanced wheels that glide across gym and hard surfaced floors, but will not leave any black marks. If you're looking for a quality rack that will last look no further you will not be disappointed with this one.
feature_bullets: STEEL - Frame construction that is built to last and is an industry leader in durability
ENHANCED - Wheels for easy transportation and storage; will not mark or scratch the flooring
GREAT FOR - Schools, leagues, collectors, and for general storage
DESIGNED - For easy access and storage of balls

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
